archiefmat.titel: Registers met afschriften van door Adriaan Anthony Brown te Cowes (Engeland) en Essequebo aan diverse personen verzonden brieven, met indexen op naam van geadresseerden
archiefmat.titel_eng: Registers of copies of letters sent by Adriaan Anthony Brown from Cowes (England) and Essequibo to various persons, with indices of names of the recipients
archiefmat.scope: Contains copies of letters sent. Information regarding life in the colony. Letters are sent to persons in the United Provinces, in other Caribbean colonies and in Essequibo.
archiefmat.notes: No. 15 contains an alphabetical index of addressees.
